#==============================================================================
Map ID: 001
Map Name: Intro
Tileset: 027: Pokemon Centers
Width: 20, Height: 15

#------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Event ID: 001
Event Name:  
(X,Y): (000,000)

Page #1
Conditions
None

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Autorun

List of Event Commands:
@>Label: Nuzlocke
@>Text: Choose a game mode.
@>Show Choices: Normal, Nuzlocke Mode
(When Cancel: Disallow)
: When [Normal]
 @>Text: You have chosen to play with <b>\c[2]normal rules\c[0]</b>. 
  :    : Is this okay?
 @>Show Choices: Yes, No
 (When Cancel: Disallow)
 : When [Yes]
  @>Label: Choose Difficulty
  @>Text: Choose a difficulty.
  @>Show Choices: Easy, Medium, Hard, Insane
  (When Cancel: Disallow)
  : When [Easy]
   @>Text: Wild Battle and Trainers will \c[2]<b>not</b>\c[0] scale to the players level.\n
    :    : Levels are predefined.
   @>Text: Are you sure you want to choose this difficulty?
   @>Show Choices: Yes, No
   (When Cancel: Choice 2)
   : When [Yes]
    @>
   : When [No]
    @>Jump to Label: Choose Difficulty
    @>
   : Branch End
   @>
  : When [Medium]
   @>Text: <b>\c[1]Trainer Battles</b>\c[0] \c[2]<b>will</b>\c[0] scale to the players level.
    :    : \nThe following levels will then be added afterwards.\nTrainers: (<b>\c[3]+0\c[0]</b> Lv. Fixed)
   @>Text: Are you sure you want to choose this difficulty?
   @>Show Choices: Yes, No
   (When Cancel: Choice 2)
   : When [Yes]
    @>Control Variables: [0027: Trainer Difficulty:] = 1
    @>
   : When [No]
    @>Jump to Label: Choose Difficulty
    @>
   : Branch End
   @>
  : When [Hard]
   @>Text: \c[1]<b>Wild Battles</b>\c[0] and \c[1]<b>Trainer Battles</b>\c[0] \c[2]<b>will</b>\c[0] scale to the players level.\nThe following levels will then be added 
    :    : afterwards.\nWild: (<b>\c[3]+0\c[0]</b> Lv. Fixed)\nTrainers: (<b>\c[3]+2\c[0]</b> Lv. Fixed)\nItem use in battle will be prohibited.
   @>Text: Are you sure you want to choose this difficulty?
   @>Show Choices: Yes, No
   (When Cancel: Choice 2)
   : When [Yes]
    @>Control Variables: [0027: Trainer Difficulty:] = 2
    @>Control Variables: [0028: Wild Battle Difficulty: ] = 3
    @>
   : When [No]
    @>Jump to Label: Choose Difficulty
    @>
   : Branch End
   @>
  : When [Insane]
   @>Text: \c[1]<b>Wild Battles</b>\c[0] and \c[1]<b>Trainer Battles</b>\c[0] \c[2]<b>will</b>\c[0] scale to the players level.\nThe following levels will then be added 
    :    : afterwards.\nWild: (<b>\c[3]+1\c[0]</b> Lv. Fixed)\nTrainers: (<b>\c[3]+3\c[0]</b> Lv. Fixed)\nItem use in battle will be prohibited.
   @>Text: Are you sure you want to choose this difficulty?
   @>Show Choices: Yes, No
   (When Cancel: Choice 2)
   : When [Yes]
    @>Control Variables: [0027: Trainer Difficulty:] = 4
    @>Control Variables: [0028: Wild Battle Difficulty: ] = 5
    @>
   : When [No]
    @>Jump to Label: Choose Difficulty
    @>
   : Branch End
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>
 : When [No]
  @>Jump to Label: Nuzlocke
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: When [Nuzlocke Mode]
 @>Text: You have chosen to play with <b>\c[2]nuzlocke rules\c[0]</b>. Is this okay?
 @>Show Choices: Yes, No
 (When Cancel: Disallow)
 : When [Yes]
  @>Text: <ac>\c[2]<b>**WARNING**</b>\c[0]\n
   :    : This mode has not been fully implemented.
  @>Jump to Label: Nuzlocke
  @>
 : When [No]
  @>Jump to Label: Nuzlocke
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: Branch End
@>Conditional Branch: Variable [0027: Trainer Difficulty:] >= 3
 @>Control Switches: [0061: System: No Items] = ON
 @>
: Branch End
@>Change Text Options: Middle, Hide
@>Text: <b><ac>\l[3]Welcome to the world of Rialtra.\nThis is Pokémon Floral Tempus.
@>Change Text Options: Bottom, Show
@>Prepare for Transition
@>Play BGM: 'Welcome to the World of Pokemon', 100, 100
@>Show Picture: 1, 'introbg', Upper Left (0,0), (100%,100%), 255, Normal
@>Execute Transition
@>Script: pbCallBub(2,3)
@>Text: BZZT...  BZZT...
@>Wait: 18 frame(s)
@>Show Picture: 2, 'introbase', Center (256,256), (100%,100%), 0, Normal
@>Show Picture: 3, 'introOak', Center (256,172), (100%,100%), 0, Normal
@>Move Picture: 2, @15, Center (256,256), (100%,100%), 255, Normal
@>Move Picture: 3, @15, Center (256,172), (100%,100%), 255, Normal
@>Wait: 18 frame(s)
@>Script: pbCallBub(2,3)
@>Text: Hello?... Ah yes! Looks like we got a connection!
@>Script: pbCallBub(2,3)
@>Text: My name is <b>\c[1]Professor Avit\c[0]</b>, the 
 :    : owner of <b>\c[1]Greenleaf Orphanage! 
@>Script: pbCallBub(2,3)
@>Text: And you must be our new resident! Nice to meet you!
@>Script: pbCallBub(2,3)
@>Text: Greenleaf Orphanage is a place where children can find refugee from the dangerous world around them.
@>Script: pbCallBub(2,3)
@>Text: Here, we take care of children and raise them to become capable adults who
 :    : can find their own place in the world! 
@>Wait: 5 frame(s)
@>Move Picture: 3, @10, Center (256,172), (100%,100%), 0, Normal
@>Wait: 10 frame(s)
@>Erase Picture: 3
@>Script: pbCallBub(2,3)
@>Text: This...
@>Show Picture: 3, 'introPichu', Center (256,220), (100%,100%), 0, Normal
@>Move Picture: 3, @10, Center (256,220), (100%,100%), 255, Normal
@>Wait: 25 frame(s)
@>Script: pbCallBub(2,3)
@>Text: Is a Pokémon called <b>Pichu</b>!
@>Script: pbCallBub(2,3)
@>Text: Greenleaf Orphanage also takes care of <b>lost</b> Pokémon or
 :    : Pokémon who were <b>abandoned</b> by their trainers.
@>Script: pbCallBub(2,3)
@>Text: When you get <b>older</b>, you'll be able to have one of your own! 
@>Wait: 5 frame(s)
@>Move Picture: 3, @10, Center (256,220), (100%,100%), 0, Normal
@>Wait: 10 frame(s)
@>Erase Picture: 3
@>Show Picture: 3, 'BW_Hilbert', Center (256,172), (100%,100%), 0, Normal
@>Move Picture: 3, @10, Center (256,172), (100%,100%), 255, Normal
@>Wait: 10 frame(s)
@>Script: pbCallBub(2,3)
@>Text: In this region, there are also very strong trainers that 
 :    : strive for the highest achievement of <b>Champion</b>!
@>Script: pbCallBub(2,3)
@>Text: These trainers use these Pokémon to battle against other
 :    : trainers.
@>Script: pbCallBub(2,3)
@>Text: Through these battles, strong bonds can be formed between trainer and Pokémon, and
 :    : amazing <b>feats</b> can be achieved through this bond.
@>Wait: 5 frame(s)
@>Move Picture: 3, @10, Center (256,172), (100%,100%), 0, Normal
@>Wait: 10 frame(s)
@>Erase Picture: 3
@>Show Picture: 3, 'introOak', Center (256,172), (100%,100%), 0, Normal
@>Move Picture: 3, @10, Center (256,172), (100%,100%), 255, Normal
@>Wait: 10 frame(s)
@>Script: pbCallBub(2,3)
@>Text: When you finally get to Greenleaf, you'll be able to 
 :    : enjoy-
@>Script: pbCallBub(2,3)
@>Text: BZZT... BZZT...
@>Wait: 12 frame(s)
@>Script: pbCallBub(2,3)
@>Text: Ah... Hello...?
@>Wait: 10 frame(s)
@>Script: pbCallBub(2,3)
@>Text: Hmm, looks like some connection issues... Maybe we should move this along then.
@>Wait: 5 frame(s)
@>Move Picture: 2, @10, Center (256,256), (100%,100%), 0, Normal
@>Move Picture: 3, @10, Center (256,172), (100%,100%), 0, Normal
@>Wait: 10 frame(s)
@>Erase Picture: 3
@>Wait: 15 frame(s)
@>Script: pbCallBub(2,3)
@>Text: I need to get your information since you'll be a <b>new resident</b> in our orphanage!
@>Script: pbGenderSelector
@>Wait: 10 frame(s)
@>Move Picture: 2, @10, Center (256,256), (100%,100%), 255, Normal
@>Move Picture: 3, @10, Center (256,178), (100%,100%), 255, Normal
@>Wait: 10 frame(s)
@>Erase Picture: 3
@>Show Picture: 3, 'introOak', Center (256,172), (100%,100%), 0, Normal
@>Move Picture: 3, @10, Center (256,172), (100%,100%), 255, Normal
@>Script: pbCallBub(2,3)
@>Text: Alright \PN, looks like I got everything!
@>Script: pbCallBub(2,3)
@>Text: You should be arriving at the orphanage soon.
@>Script: pbCallBub(2,3)
@>Text: I hope you can accept this orphanage
 :    : as your new home and make new friends here.
@>Script: pbCallBub(2,3)
@>Text: I look forward to seeing you grow up and one day 
 :    : become an <b>exemplary trainer</b>!
@>Script: pbCallBub(2,3)
@>Text: A world of exciting Pokémon adventures awaits you in your new home!
@>Script: pbCallBub(2,3)
@>Text: Let's make your stay here an amazing experience!
@>Fade Out BGM: 2 sec.
@>Script: pbToneChangeAll(
:       :   Tone.new(-255, -255, -255, 0),
:       :   25)
@>Wait: 35 frame(s)
@>Change Transparent Flag: Transparency
@>Erase Picture: 1
@>Erase Picture: 2
@>Erase Picture: 3
@>Transfer Player:[033: Hidden Place], (011,013), Up
@>Change Text Options: Middle, Hide
@>Text: <b><ac>\l[3]10 Years Later...
@>Change Text Options: Bottom, Show
@>Script: $player.has_pokegear = true
:       : $player.has_running_shoes = true
@>Script: pbToneChangeAll(
:       :   Tone.new(0, 0, 0, 0),
:       :   25)
@>Wait: 20 frame(s)
@>

#------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Event ID: 002
Event Name: Quick start intro
(X,Y): (000,014)

Page #1
Conditions
None

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Action Button

List of Event Commands:
@>Comment: This is the Debug intro, used to quickly start a game. 
 :       : The player's name and trainer type are chosen 
 :       : automatically.
@>Script: pbChangePlayer(0)
@>Script: pbTrainerName("Red")
@>Control Self Switch: A =ON
@>Script: pbToneChangeAll(
:       :   Tone.new(-255, -255, -255, 0),
:       :   0
:       : )
@>Transfer Player:[003: Route O: Underwater], (025,006), Down, No Fade
@>Script: pbToneChangeAll(
:       :   Tone.new(0, 0, 0, 0),
:       :   10
:       : )
@>Wait: 10 frame(s)
@>

Conditions

Graphic: trchar035

Autonomous Movement

Options Enabled
Move Animation

List of Event Commands:
@>Control Variables: [0077: Battle Counter] = 1
@>Script: pbCallBub(2,9)
@>Text: <b>Garrison</b>: This gym is a little over the top isn't it...
@>Script: pbCallBub(2,9)
@>Text: <b>Garrison</b>: It belonged to <b>Dori's father</b> so 
 :    : it kind of makes sense.
@>Set Move Route: [EV009]
 :              : $>Turn Up
@>Script: pbCallBub(2,9)
@>Text: <b>Garrison</b>: He always likes to go above and beyond with
 :    : the things he loves.
@>Set Move Route: [EV009]
 :              : $>Turn Down
@>Script: pbCallBub(2,9)
@>Text: <b>Garrison</b>: Dori and her friends kind of ruined the puzzles in the gym
 :    : because they got bored.
@>Script: pbCallBub(2,9)
@>Text: <b>Garrison</b>: It did suck having to do it everytime I wanted to get
 :    : to this room, so I guess she did something good for once...
@>Script: pbCallBub(2,9)
@>Text: <b>Garrison</b>: Honestly, I shouldn't be thinking about that
 :    : stuff right now.
@>Script: pbCallBub(2,9)
@>Text: <b>Garrison</b>: This battle will be your first
 :    : test, and a test for me as well.
@>Script: pbCallBub(2,9)
@>Text: <b>Garrison</b>: If we want to be able to save Dori
 :    : we both need to give our all here.
@>Script: pbCallBub(2,9)
@>Text: <b>Garrison</b>: Just know this...
@>Script: pbCallBub(2,9)
@>Text: <b>Garrison</b>: Grass-Type Pokémon can be very <b>threatening.
@>Script: pbCallBub(2,9)
@>Text: <b>Garrison</b>: While not as strong, or as versatile as
 :    : other types, Grass-Type Pokémon still have their own
 :    : ways to shine in battle.
@>Script: pbCallBub(2,9)
@>Text: <b>Garrison</b>: You ready to see 'em?
@>Script: pbCallBub(2,9)
@>Text: <b>Garrison: You better be!
@>Comment: EndSpeech: That's it!
@>Script: setBattleRule("outcome", 0)
@>Script: EliteBattle.assign_transition("minorTrainer", :LEADER_Garrison)
@>Conditional Branch: Script: TrainerBattle.start(:LEADER_Garrison, "Garrison", 0)
 @>Control Self Switch: A =ON
 @>
: Branch End
@>

Page #2
Conditions

Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Action Button

List of Event Commands:

@>Script: pbCallBub(2,9)
@>Text: <b>Garrison</b>: Oh you're back for round 2? Perfect!
@>Script: pbCallBub(2,9)
@>Text: <b>Garrison: You're going down, \PN!
@>Comment: EndSpeech: That's it!
@>Script: setBattleRule("outcome", 0)
@>Script: EliteBattle.assign_transition("minorTrainer", :LEADER_Garrison)

 @>Control Self Switch: A =ON

Page #3
Conditions

Graphic: trchar035

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Autorun

List of Event Commands:
@>Conditional Branch: Variable [0077: Battle Counter] >= 2
 @>Control Variables: [0080: Win Counter: Garrison] += 1
 @>Control Variables: [0077: Battle Counter] = 0
 @>
: Branch End
@>Script: pbCallBub(2,9)
@>Text: <b>Garrison</b>: Woah! It's over already?
@>Script: pbCallBub(2,9)
@>Text: <b>Garrison</b>: That was insane!  I've never had a battle like
 :    : that before.
@>Script: pbCallBub(2,9)
@>Text: <b>Garrison</b>: \PN, you've got a lot of potential!
@>Script: pbCallBub(2,9)
@>Text: <b>Garrison</b>: You know the right options every time, you and your Pokémon
 :    : were so in sync!
@>Script: pbCallBub(2,9)
@>Text: <b>Garrison</b>: I'm genuinely impressed!
@>Script: pbCallBub(2,9)
@>Text: <b>Garrison</b>: You've earned this!
@>Script: renderBadgeAnimation(0)
@>Script: pbCallBub(2,9)
@>Text: <b>Garrison</b>: That badge will allow you to raise Pokémon to <b>Level 30</b>, and have them
 :    : obey you.
@>Script: pbCallBub(2,9)
@>Text: <b>Garrison</b>: Also take this...!
@>Script: pbReceiveItem(:TM033,1)
@>Script: pbCallBub(2,9)
@>Text: <b>Garrison</b>: That TM is the one for \c[3]<b>Magical Leaf</b>\c[0].
@>Script: pbCallBub(2,9)
@>Text: <b>Garrison</b>: It never misses which makes a decently solid move for some weaker
 :    : Pokémon!
@>Script: pbCallBub(2,9)
@>Text: <b>Garrison</b>: Well! I guess that's that! I'm gonna head outside
 :    : and see if Del and Faye are ready!
@>Change Screen Color Tone: (-255,-255,-255,0), @15
@>Wait: 18 frame(s)
@>Control Switches: [0101: First Gym: Defeated - Event 1] = ON
@>Wait: 18 frame(s)
@>Change Screen Color Tone: (0,0,0,0), @15
@>

Page #1
Conditions

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed

Options Enabled

@>Show Animation: Player, [Thinking Emote]
@>Wait: 24 frame(s)

 :    : trainers like yourself!
@>Text: \me[Key get] You got an Encounter Checker!\wt[32]
@>Script: pbCallBub(2,1)

 :    : caught, and tells you how much you're missing!

@>Script: pbCallBub(2,56)
@>Text: <b>Maid</b>: Yes... I am a maid here... Is something the matter?
@>Set Move Route: [Maid 56]
 :              : $>Turn Down
@>Show Animation: [Maid 56], [Exclaim bubble]
@>Wait: 12 frame(s)
@>Script: pbCallBub(2,56)
@>Text: <b>Maid</b>: \PN? What are you doing back here? Shouldn't you be out there <b>exploring</b> the
 :    : region and all...?
@>Set Move Route: [Maid 56]
 :              : $>Turn Right
@>Script: pbCallBub(2,55)
@>Text: <b>Scarlett</b>: We're looking for a girl named, <b>Dori</b>? 
 :    : Has she come in here at all?

Event ID: 036
Event Name: EV036
(X,Y): (017,002)

Page #1
Conditions
None

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Action Button

List of Event Commands:
@>Text: It's a bunch of stuff that you already know.
@>Show Choices: Controls, Adventure, Difficulty Setting, No info needed
(When Cancel: Choice 4)
: When [Controls]
 @>Script: pbEventScreen(ButtonEventScene)
 @>Jump to Label: Help Choices
 @>
: When [Adventure]
 @>Text: \bWell then, without further ado...
 @>Script: pbToneChangeAll(Tone.new(-255,-255,-255,0),10)
 @>Wait: 10 frame(s)
 @>Show Picture: 4, 'helpadventurebg', Upper Left (0,0), (100%,100%), 0, Normal
 @>Move Picture: 4, @10, Upper Left (0,0), (100%,100%), 255, Normal
 @>Wait: 10 frame(s)
 @>Change Text Options: Middle, Hide
 @>Text: <ac>\c[0]\l[3]You are about to enter a world\nwhere 
  :    : you will embark on a grand\nadventure of your very 
  :    : own.
 @>Text: <ac>\c[0]\l[5]Speak to people and check things\n
  :    : wherever you go, be it in towns,\nroads or caves.\n
  :    : Gather information and hints from\n
  :    : every possible source.
 @>Text: <ac>\c[0]\l[3]New paths will open to you when\n
  :    : you help people in need, overcome\n
  :    : challenges, and solve mysteries.
 @>Text: <ac>\c[0]\l[7]At times, you will be challenged\n
  :    : by others to a battle.\n
  :    : At other times, wild creatures\nmay stand in your way.\n\n
  :    : By overcoming such hurdles,\nyou will gain great power.
 @>Text: <ac>\c[0]\l[2]However, your adventure is not\n
  :    : solely about becoming powerful.
 @>Text: <ac>\c[0]\l[7]On your travels, we hope that\n
  :    : you will meet countless people\n
  :    : and, through them, achieve\npersonal growth.\n\n
  :    : This is the most important\nobjective of this adventure.
 @>Move Picture: 4, @10, Upper Left (0,0), (100%,100%), 0, Normal
 @>Wait: 10 frame(s)
 @>Erase Picture: 4
 @>Script: pbToneChangeAll(Tone.new(0,0,0,0),10)
 @>Wait: 10 frame(s)
 @>Change Text Options: Bottom, Show
 @>Jump to Label: Help Choices
 @>
: When [Difficulty Setting]
 @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0027: Trainer Difficulty:] == 0
  @>Text: The current difficulty is set to \c[1]<b>Easy</b>\c[0].
  @>Text: Trainers and Wild Pokémon will not scale to the players level.
  @>
 : Else
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0027: Trainer Difficulty:] == 1
  @>Text: The current difficulty is set to \c[2]<b>Medium</b>\c[0].
  @>Text: Trainers will gain the following levels after they have been scaled to the players team:\nTrainers: Trainers: (<b>\c[3]+0\c[0]</b> Lv. Fixed)
  @>
 : Else
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0027: Trainer Difficulty:] == 2
  @>Text: The current difficulty is set to \c[3]<b>Hard</b>\c[0].
  @>Text: Trainers and Wild Pokémon will gain the following levels after they have been scaled to the players team:\n
   :    : Wild: (<b>\c[3]+0\c[0]</b> Lv. Fixed)\nTrainers: (<b>\c[3]+2\c[0]</b> Lv. Fixed)\nItem use in battle will be prohibited.
  @>
 : Else
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0027: Trainer Difficulty:] == 4
  @>Text: The current difficulty is set to \c[4]<b>Insane</b>\c[0].
  @>Text: Trainers and Wild Pokémon will gain the following levels after they have been scaled to the players team:\n
   :    : Wild: (<b>\c[3]+1\c[0]</b> Lv. Fixed)\nTrainers: (<b>\c[3]+3\c[0]</b> Lv. Fixed)\nItem use in battle will be prohibited.
  @>
 : Else
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>Text: Would you like to change it?
 @>Show Choices: Yes, No
 (When Cancel: Choice 2)
 : When [Yes]
  @>Label: Choose Difficulty
  @>Text: Choose a difficulty.
  @>Show Choices: Easy, Medium, Hard, Insane
  (When Cancel: Disallow)
  : When [Easy]
   @>Text: Wild Battle and Trainers will \c[2]<b>not</b>\c[0] scale to the players level.\n
    :    : Levels are predefined.
   @>Text: Are you sure you want to choose this difficulty?

    @>
   : When [No]

   : Branch End
   @>

@>Text: <b>Grayhardt</b>: Now I don't have any fancy gadgets or nothin', but I do have
 :    : Pokémon raised here on this ranch!
@>Script: numBuffs = 2
:       : pkmn = Pokemon.new(:EEVEE,5)
:       : stats = [0,1,2,3,4,5]
:       : stats = stats.sort{rand()-0.5}
:       : buffs = stats[0..(numBuffs-1)]
:       : buffs.each do |stat|
:       : pkmn.iv[stat] = 31
:       : end
:       : pbAddPokemon(pkmn)
@>Script: pbCallBub(2,2)
@>Text: <b>Grayhardt</b>: There you go! An Eevee from this ere' ranch!
@>Script: pbCallBub(2,2)
@>Text: <b>Grayhardt</b>: Eevee is a <b>rarity</b> in Rialtra, so take
 :    : good care of that one.
@>Script: pbCallBub(2,2)
@>Text: <b>Grayhardt</b>: If you're looking for Leona, she's in the house next over. 
 :    : That's where her <b>lab</b> is.
@>Script: pbCallBub(2,2)
@>Text: <b>Grayhardt</b>: You should go and see her for some nice eqiupment to
 :    : take on the road with ya'.
@>Change Screen Color Tone: (-255,-255,-255,0), @20
@>Recover All: Entire Party
@>Wait: 20 frame(s)
@>Play ME: 'Pkmn healing 2', 100, 100
@>Wait: 30 frame(s)
@>Change Screen Color Tone: (0,0,0,0), @20
@>Control Switches: [0071: GP: Eevee] = ON

Options Enabled

List of Event Commands:

@>Memorize BGM/BGS
@>Fade Out BGM: 1 sec.
@>Set Event Location: [Faye],(043,073)
@>Set Event Location: [Ralts],(043,074)
@>Script: pbCallBub(2,8)
@>Text: <b>Faye</b>: \PN!
@>Set Move Route: Player
 :              : $>Turn Down
@>Script: FollowingPkmn.move_route([
:       :          PBMoveRoute::TurnDown,
:       :          PBMoveRoute::Wait,4,
:       :          PBMoveRoute::Right,
:       :          PBMoveRoute::Up,
:       :          PBMoveRoute::TurnDown,
:       : ])
@>Set Move Route: [Faye]
 :              : $>Move Up
 :              : $>Move Up
 :              : $>Move Up
 :              : $>Move Up
 :              : $>Move Up
 :              : $>Move Up
@>Set Move Route: [Ralts]
 :              : $>Move Up
 :              : $>Move Up
 :              : $>Move Up
 :              : $>Move Up
 :              : $>Move Up
 :              : $>Move Up
 :              : $>Move Right
 :              : $>Move Up
@>Play BGM: 'Faye Encounter', 100, 100
@>Wait for Move's Completion
@>Scroll Map: Down, 1, 3
@>Wait: 8 frame(s)
@>Script: pbCallBub(2,8)
@>Text: <b>Faye</b>: I finally caught up to you!
@>Script: pbCallBub(2,8)
@>Text: <b>Faye</b>: Do you see my Pokémon? It's <b>Ralts!
@>Script: pbCallBub(2,8)
@>Text: <b>Faye</b>: I was so happy when I saw it with the 
 :    : Professor! I've always wanted a Ralts ever since 
 :    : the Professor taught us about it in class!
@>Script: pbCallBub(2,8)
@>Text: <b>Faye</b>: I've also trained it up a bit and caught a new 
 :    : partner before I got here.
@>Script: pbCallBub(2,8)
@>Text: <b>Faye</b>: Which means I'm ready to <b>take you on!
@>Script: pbCallBub(2,8)
@>Text: <b>Faye</b>: I'll heal you up, so we can have a fair
 :    : battle.
@>Change Screen Color Tone: (-255,-255,-255,0), @20
@>Wait: 24 frame(s)
@>Recover All: Entire Party
@>Play ME: 'Pkmn healing', 100, 100
@>Wait: 30 frame(s)
@>Change Screen Color Tone: (0,0,0,0), @20
@>Script: pbCallBub(2,8)
@>Text: <b>Faye</b>: It's gonna be our first battle against each other 
 :    : ever.
@>Script: pbCallBub(2,8)
@>Text: <b>Faye</b>: Show me what you've got, \PN!
@>Conditional Branch: Script: TrainerBattle.start(:POKEMONTRAINER_Faye, "Faye")
 @>Control Self Switch: A =ON
 @>
: Branch End
@>

Page #3
Conditions
Self Switch A is ON

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Autorun

List of Event Commands:
@>Conditional Branch: Variable [0077: Battle Counter] >= 2
 @>Control Variables: [0078: Win Counter: Faye] += 1
 @>Control Variables: [0077: Battle Counter] = 0
 @>Comment: Faye's Outcome Counter: Essentially how many times she's won
  :       : against the player. Every time she wins, and the player opts to not use
  :       : F12, the game will check if she's been challenged twice, and give Faye her win.
  :       : (Used for Endgame/E.E.)
 @>
: Branch End
@>Play BGM: 'Faye Encounter', 100, 100
@>Script: pbCallBub(2,8)
@>Text: <b>Faye</b>: Woah!
@>Script: pbCallBub(2,8)
@>Text: <b>Faye</b>: \PN, that was so fun!
@>Conditional Branch: Variable [0007: Starter choice] == 1
 @>Script: pbCallBub(2,8)
 @>Text: <b>Faye</b>: Ralts was so cool, but your Grookey was so 
  :    : tricky! It really gave Cottonee a hard time!
 @>
: Branch End
@>Conditional Branch: Variable [0007: Starter choice] == 2
 @>Script: pbCallBub(2,8)
 @>Text: <b>Faye</b>: Ralts was so cool, but your Scorbunny was 
  :    : on fire! It was so fast! Ralts had a tough time keeping 
  :    : up!
 @>
: Branch End
@>Conditional Branch: Variable [0007: Starter choice] == 3
 @>Script: pbCallBub(2,8)
 @>Text: <b>Faye</b>: Ralts was so cool, but your Sobble was
  :    : really awesome! I really wasn't ready for it to be so 
  :    : strong!
 @>
: Branch End
@>Conditional Branch: Variable [0007: Starter choice] == 4
 @>Script: pbCallBub(2,8)
 @>Text: <b>Faye</b>: Ralts was so cool, but your Salandit was so 
  :    : clever with it's movement! I was suprised to see it manuever
  :    : so well!
 @>
: Branch End
@>Conditional Branch: Variable [0007: Starter choice] == 5
 @>Script: pbCallBub(2,8)
 @>Text: <b>Faye</b>: Ralts was so cool, but your Hoothoot was so 
  :    : strong! I wasn't expecting that!
 @>
: Branch End
@>Conditional Branch: Variable [0007: Starter choice] == 6
 @>Script: pbCallBub(2,8)
 @>Text: <b>Faye</b>: Ralts was so cool but your Duskull was very cool! I wasn't expecting
  :    : all of those tricks!
 @>
: Branch End
@>Script: pbCallBub(2,8)
@>Text: <b>Faye</b>: You and your Pokémon have a lot of 
 :    : potential, \PN.
@>Script: pbCallBub(2,8)
@>Text: <b>Faye</b>: You looked like a natural. The way you were 
 :    : commanding your Pokémon looked like those pro 
 :    : trainers we see on T.V.
@>Script: pbCallBub(2,8)
@>Text: <b>Faye</b>: Since you've adopted their style so
 :    : well, you'll have no trouble taking on gym leaders and such!
@>Set Move Route: [Faye]
 :              : $>Through ON
 :              : $>Move Right
 :              : $>Move Up
 :              : $>Move Up
 :              : $>Turn Left
 :              : $>Through OFF
@>Set Move Route: [Ralts]
 :              : $>Through ON
 :              : $>Move Right
 :              : $>Move Up
 :              : $>Move Up
 :              : $>Turn Left
 :              : $>Through OFF
@>Set Move Route: Player
 :              : $>Wait: 4 frame(s)
 :              : $>Turn Right
@>Script: FollowingPkmn.move_route([
:       :          PBMoveRoute::Up,
:       :          PBMoveRoute::Left,
:       :          PBMoveRoute::TurnRight,  
:       : ])
@>Scroll Map: Up, 1, 3
@>Wait for Move's Completion
@>Script: pbCallBub(2,8)
@>Text: <b>Faye</b>: Here!
@>Script: pbReceiveItem(:ABILITYCAPSULE,1)
@>Script: pbCallBub(2,8)
@>Text: <b>Faye</b>: The professor gave Del and I some items to help us
 :    : out, and he gave us some <b>extras</b> to hand out to you!
@>Script: pbCallBub(2,8)
@>Text: <b>Faye</b>: He gave me me two Ability Capsules and gave
 :    : Del two <b>Ability Patches</b>.
@>Script: pbCallBub(2,8)
@>Text: <b>Faye</b>: Remind Del to give you the other Ability Patch he has.
@>Script: pbCallBub(2,8)
@>Text: <b>Faye</b>: He'll probably let it slip his mind like he usually does.
@>Set Move Route: [Faye]
 :              : $>Through ON
 :              : $>Move Up
 :              : $>Move Up
 :              : $>Turn Down
 :              : $>Through OFF
@>Set Move Route: [Ralts]
 :              : $>Through ON
 :              : $>Move Up
 :              : $>Move Up
 :              : $>Turn Down
 :              : $>Through OFF
@>Set Move Route: Player
 :              : $>Turn Up
@>Script: FollowingPkmn.move_route([
:       :          PBMoveRoute::TurnUp,  
:       : ])
@>Scroll Map: Up, 1, 3
@>Wait for Move's Completion
@>Script: pbCallBub(2,8)
@>Text: <b>Faye</b>: I'm gonna go explore this city!
@>Script: pbCallBub(2,8)
@>Text: <b>Faye</b>: If you see me, hit me up! I'll always be 
 :    : down to chat!
@>Fade Out BGM: 1 sec.
@>Set Move Route: [Faye]
 :              : $>Through ON
 :              : $>Move Up
 :              : $>Move Up
 :              : $>Move Up
 :              : $>Move Up
 :              : $>Move Up
 :              : $>Move Up
 :              : $>Move Up
 :              : $>Through OFF
@>Set Move Route: [Ralts]
 :              : $>Through ON

 :              : $>Move Up
 :              : $>Move Up

 :              : $>Move Up
 :              : $>Move Up

 :              : $>Move Up

 @>

  :       : against the player. Every time she wins, and the player opts to not use

#------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Event ID: 002
Event Name: Nurse
(X,Y): (010,007)

Page #1
Conditions
None

Graphic: NPC 16

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Action Button

List of Event Commands:
@>Control Switches: [0074: BFL: Start] = OFF
@>Scroll Map: Up, 1, 3
@>Wait: 8 frame(s)
@>Script: pbSetPokemonCenter
@>Script: pbCallBub(2,2)
@>Text: Hello, and welcome to the Lillium City Pokémon Center.
@>Script: pbCallBub(2,2)
@>Text: We restore your tired Pokémon to full health.
@>Script: pbCallBub(2,2)
@>Text: Would you like to rest your Pokémon?
@>Show Choices: Yes, No
(When Cancel: Choice 2)
: When [Yes]
 @>Script: pbCallBub(2,2)
 @>Text: OK, I'll take your Pokémon for a few seconds.
 @>Recover All: Entire Party
 @>Set Move Route: [EV003]
  :              : $>Turn Right
 @>Set Move Route: This event
  :              : $>Turn Up
  :              : $>Wait: 2 frame(s)
 @>Wait for Move's Completion
 @>Control Variables: [0006: Poké Center healing ball count] = 0
 @>Script: count=$player.pokemon_count
 :       : for i in 1..count
 :       :   pbSet(6,i)
 :       :   pbSEPlay("Battle ball shake")
 :       :   pbWait(16)
 :       : end
 @>Set Move Route: [PC]
  :              : $>Stop Animation ON
 @>Play ME: 'Pkmn healing', 100, 100
 @>Wait: 58 frame(s)
 @>Control Variables: [0006: Poké Center healing ball count] = 0
 @>Set Move Route: [PC]
  :              : $>Stop Animation OFF
 @>Set Move Route: This event
  :              : $>Wait: 15 frame(s)
  :              : $>Turn Down
 @>Set Move Route: [EV003]
  :              : $>Wait: 15 frame(s)
  :              : $>Turn Down
 @>Wait for Move's Completion
 @>Conditional Branch: Script: pbPokerus?
  @>Script: pbCallBub(2,2)
  @>Text: Your Pokémon may be infected by PokeRus.
  @>Script: pbCallBub(2,2)
  @>Text: Little is known about the PokeRus except that they 
   :    : are microscopic life-forms that attach to Pokémon.
  @>Script: pbCallBub(2,2)
  @>Text: While infected, Pokémon are said to grow 
   :    : exceptionally well.
  @>Control Switches: [0002: Seen Pokérus in Poké Center] = ON
  @>
 : Else
  @>Script: pbCallBub(2,2)
  @>Text: Thank you for waiting.
  @>Script: pbCallBub(2,2)
  @>Text: We've restored your Pokémon to full health.
  @>Set Move Route: This event
   :              : $>Graphic: "NPC 16', 0, 2, 1
   :              : $>Wait: 10 frame(s)
   :              : $>Graphic: "NPC 16', 0, 2, 0
  @>Wait for Move's Completion
  @>Script: pbCallBub(2,2)
  @>Text: We hope to see you again!
  @>Scroll Map: Down, 1, 3
  @>Wait: 8 frame(s)
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>

       :       : :POTION,:SUPERPOTION,
       :       : :ANTIDOTE,:PARALYZEHEAL,
       :       : :BURNHEAL,:ICEHEAL,
       :       : :AWAKENING,:REPEL,
       :       : :ESCAPEROPE
       :       : ])
       @>
      : Else
       @>Script: pbPokemonMart([
       :       : :BADCANDY,
       :       : :POKEBALL,
       :       : :POTION,
       :       : :ANTIDOTE,
       :       : :PARALYZEHEAL,
       :       : ])
       @>
      : Branch End
      @>
     : Branch End
     @>
    : Branch End
    @>
   : Branch End
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: When [PokéBalls]
 @>Script: pbCallBub(2,5)
 @>Script: pbPokemonMart([
 :       : :DUSKBALL,
 :       : :LOVEBALL,
 :       : :NETBALL,
 :       : :NESTBALL,
 :       : :HEALBALL,
 :       : :QUICKBALL,
 :       : :TIMERBALL,
 :       : :LUXURYBALL,
 :       : :REPEATBALL
 :       : ])
 @>
: Branch End
@>Scroll Map: Down, 1, 3
@>Wait: 8 frame(s)
@>

(X,Y): (008,081)

Page #1
Conditions
None

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Event Touch

List of Event Commands:
@>Script: FollowingPkmn.toggle(false,true)
@>Memorize BGM/BGS
@>Set Move Route: Player
 :              : $>Move Right
 :              : $>Move Right
 :              : $>Move Right
@>Wait for Move's Completion
@>Set Move Route: [Faye 45]
 :              : $>Turn Down
@>Scroll Map: Right, 1, 3
@>Wait: 8 frame(s)
@>Script: pbCallBub(2,45)
@>Text: <b>Faye</b>: There they are!
@>Script: pbCallBub(2,45)

 :              : $>SE: 'Automatic Door', 100, 100
 :              : $>Wait: 2 frame(s)

 :              : $>Wait: 2 frame(s)
 :              : $>Turn Right
 :              : $>Wait: 2 frame(s)
 :              : $>Turn Up
 :              : $>Wait: 2 frame(s)

                  (Ignore If Can't Move)
 :              : $>Through ON
 :              : $>Move Up
 :              : $>Through OFF

                  (Ignore If Can't Move)
 :              : $>Wait: 2 frame(s)

 :              : $>Wait: 2 frame(s)
 :              : $>Turn Left

 :              : $>Wait: 2 frame(s)

@>

@>Text: <b>???</b>: Hey there!
@>Text: <b>???</b>: I'm looking for a Pichu. My daughter really wants one!
@>Text: <b>???</b>: You're a Pokémon trainer right? Can you help me?
@>Show Choices: Sure, Nah
(When Cancel: Choice 2)
: When [Sure]
 @>Text: <b>???</b>: Oh my god! Thanks!
 @>Text: <b>???</b>: My name's Aurora, by the way. You are...?
 @>Text: \c[1]<b>Aurora</b>\c[0]: My name's Aurora, by the way. You are...?
 @>Show Animation: Player, [Thinking Emote]
 @>Wait: 24 frame(s)
 @>Text: <b>Aurora</b>: \PN...? Okay, nice to meet you \PN!
 @>Text: <b>Aurora</b>: The Pokémon we're looking for is <b>Pichu</b>.
 @>Text: <b>Aurora</b>: The little bastard keeps evading me, and my Pokémon aren't
  :    : doing a good job of <b>weakening</b> them...
 @>Text: <b>Aurora</b>: Do you have a way you can catch them?
 @>Text: <b>Aurora</b>: And once you catch it, we can go <b>surprise</b> my daughter with her
  :    : <b>first ever</b> Pokémon!
 @>Text: <b>Aurora</b>: Let me know if you find one!
 @>Control Switches: [0001: Starting over] = ON
 @>Comment: Quest.start
  :       : New Page with Switch
  :       : Remove Daughter after Pichu caught
  :       : Search for Daughter
  :       : New side map with abandoned building and forest
 @>Comment: Team Blight grunts there looking for Pokemon
  :       : Daughter not with them
  :       : Daughter found with a spiky eared Pichu.
  :       : Mother scolds her, daughter cries.
  :       : Mom thanks trainer, gives her the caught Pichu, Trainer gets Spiky Ear'd and some TM's.(DECIDING)
 @>

@>Script: pbCallBub(2,7)
@>Text: Welcome to the Rangers Redeem corner!
@>Script: pbCallBub(2,7)
@>Text: Here you can redeem any points you've earned from missions,
 :    : for rare and exclusive items!
@>Label: Ask
@>Script: pbCallBub(2,7)
@>Text: Would you like to redeem your points today?
@>Show Choices: Yeah, No, Point Bank Balance
(When Cancel: Choice 2)
: When [Yeah]
 @>Label: Ask 2
 @>Text: What would like to get?\ch[168,8,Leftovers - 200,
  :    : Choice Band - 150,Choice Scarf - 150,Choice Specs - 150,
  :    : Assault Vest - 150,Air Balloon - 100,Expert Belt - 100,None]
 @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0168] == 0
  @>Script: pbCallBub(2,7)
  @>Text: You want to redeem your points for the <b>Leftovers</b>?
  @>Script: pbCallBub(2,7)
  @>Text: It'll be <b>200 points</b>.
  @>Show Choices: Yes, No
  (When Cancel: Choice 2)
  : When [Yes]
   @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0164] >= 200
    @>Script: pbCallBub(2,7)
    @>Text: Alrighty then! I'll just <b>deduct</b> the points from your point
     :    : bank and give you your item!
    @>Control Variables: [0164] -= 200
    @>Script: pbReceiveItem(:LEFTOVERS,1)
    @>Script: pbCallBub(2,7)
    @>Text: <b>200 points</b> have been deducted from your bank. You now
     :    : have \v[164].
    @>
   : Else
    @>Script: pbCallBub(2,7)
    @>Text: Looks like you don't have enough points. You won't
     :    : be able to get this item today.
    @>Script: pbCallBub(2,7)
    @>Text: Come back with more points next time.
    @>
   : Branch End
   @>
  : When [No]
   @>Jump to Label: Ask 2
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0168] == 1
  @>Script: pbCallBub(2,7)

#------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Event ID: 002
Event Name: Name Rater
(X,Y): (018,017)

Page #1
Conditions
None

Graphic: NPC 10

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Action Button

List of Event Commands:
@>Script: pbCallBub(2,2)
@>Text: Hello, hello!\nI am the official <b>Name Rater</b>!
@>Script: pbCallBub(2,2)
@>Text: Want me to rate the <b>nicknames</b> of your Pokémon?
@>Show Choices: Yes, No
(When Cancel: Choice 2)
: When [Yes]
 @>Script: pbCallBub(2,2)
 @>Text: Which Pokémon's <b>nickname</b> should I critique?
 @>Comment: Opens a screen for choosing a Pokémon.  The index 
  :       : is stored in variable 1, the name in variable 3.
 @>Script: pbChoosePokemon(1,3)
 @>Comment: If variable 1 is less than 0, it means the player has 
  :       : canceled choosing a Pokémon.
 @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0001: Temp Pokemon Choice] < 0
  @>Script: pbCallBub(2,2)
  @>Text: I see.\nDo come visit again.
  @>Exit Event Processing
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>Comment: Check for eggs.
 @>Conditional Branch: Script: pbGetPokemon(1).egg?
  @>Script: pbCallBub(2,2)
  @>Text: Now, now... That is merely an Egg!
  @>Exit Event Processing
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>Comment: Check for Shadow Pokémon.
 @>Conditional Branch: Script: pbGetPokemon(1).shadowPokemon?
  @>Script: pbCallBub(2,2)
  @>Text: I wouldn't dare critique a Shadow Pokémon's name!
  @>Exit Event Processing
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>Conditional Branch: Script: pbGetPokemon(1).foreign?($player)
  @>Script: pbCallBub(2,2)
  @>Text: Hmmm... \v[3] it is!
  @>Script: pbCallBub(2,2)
  @>Text: This is a magnificent <b>nickname</b>! It is impeccably 
   :    : beyond reproach!
  @>Script: pbCallBub(2,2)
  @>Text: You'll do well to cherish your \v[3] now and 
   :    : beyond.
  @>Exit Event Processing
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>Script: pbCallBub(2,2)
 @>Text: \v[3], is it?\nThat is a decent <b>nickname</b>!
 @>Script: pbCallBub(2,2)
 @>Text: But, would you like me to give it a nicer name?
 @>Script: pbCallBub(2,2)
 @>Text: How about it?
 @>Show Choices: Yes, No
 (When Cancel: Choice 2)
 : When [Yes]
  @>Script: pbCallBub(2,2)
  @>Text: Ah, good. Then, what shall the new <b>nickname</b> be?
  @>Script: pkmn = pbGetPokemon(1)
  :       : species = pkmn.speciesName
  :       : pbSet(4, species)
  :       : pbTextEntry("#{species}'s nickname?",
  :       :   0, Pokemon::MAX_NAME_SIZE, 5)
  @>Conditional Branch: Script: pbGet(5) == pbGet(3) || (pbGet(5) == "" && pbGet(3) == pbGet(4))
   @>Comment: Resets the Pokémon's nickname to the species name.
   @>Script: pkmn = pbGetPokemon(1)
   :       : pkmn.name = nil
   :       : pbSet(3, pkmn.name)
   @>Script: pbCallBub(2,2)
   @>Text: Done! From now on, this Pokémon shall be known
    :    : as \v[3]!
   @>Script: pbCallBub(2,2)
   @>Text: It looks no different from before, and yet, this is 
    :    : vastly superior!
   @>Script: pbCallBub(2,2)
   @>Text: How fortunate for you!
   @>
  : Else
   @>Comment: Retrieves the Pokémon indexed at variable 1 and 
    :       : changes its name to variable 5.
   @>Script: pkmn = pbGetPokemon(1)
   :       : pkmn.name = pbGet(5)
   @>Script: pbCallBub(2,2)
   @>Text: Done! From now on, this Pokémon shall be known
    :    : as \v[5]!
   @>Script: pbCallBub(2,2)
   @>Text: It is a better name than before!\nHow fortunate for 
    :    : you!
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>
 : When [No]
  @>Script: pbCallBub(2,2)
  @>Text: I see.\nDo come visit again.
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: When [No]
 @>Script: pbCallBub(2,2)
 @>Text: I see.\nDo come visit again.
 @>
: Branch End
@>

@>Script: pbCallBub(2,17)
@>Text: Take one!

@>Script: pbCallBub(2,17)

: When [Yeah]
 @>Script: pbCallBub(2,6)
 @>Text: Alright then! Lets get started!
 @>Script: pbCallBub(2,6)
 @>Text: What is Shedinja's base HP stat?
 @>Show Choices: 1, 10, 0, 50
 (When Cancel: Disallow)
 : When [1]
  @>Script: pbCallBub(2,6)
  @>Text: Correct!
  @>Script: pbCallBub(2,6)
  @>Text: Alright what about this!
  @>Script: pbCallBub(2,6)
  @>Text: What Pokémon out of these four, has the highest \c[6] Base stat total?
  @>Show Choices: Porygon Z, Naganadel, Darmanitan, Goodra
  (When Cancel: Disallow)
  : When [Porygon Z]
   @>Script: pbCallBub(2,6)
   @>Text: Ooh! Not quite the answer I was looking for! Try again.
   @>
  : When [Naganadel]
   @>Script: pbCallBub(2,6)
   @>Text: Ooh! Not quite the answer I was looking for! Try again.
   @>
  : When [Darmanitan]
   @>Script: pbCallBub(2,6)
   @>Text: Ooh! Not quite the answer I was looking for! Try again.
   @>
  : When [Goodra]
   @>Script: pbCallBub(2,6)
   @>Text: Wow! Two in a row! Nice job!
   @>Script: pbCallBub(2,6)
   @>Text: Alright last one!
   @>Script: pbCallBub(2,6)
   @>Text: Which of these types has the most weaknesses?
   @>Show Choices: Rock, Psychic, Ground, Fire
   (When Cancel: Disallow)
   : When [Rock]
    @>Script: pbCallBub(2,6)
    @>Text: Holy Moly! You got all the answer's correct!
    @>Script: pbCallBub(2,6)
    @>Text: Here this is for you!
    @>Conditional Branch: Script: pbGenerateEgg(:TOGEPI)
     @>Text: You received a Pokemon egg!
     @>Play ME: 'Evolution success', 100, 100
     @>Wait: 40 frame(s)
     @>Script: pbCallBub(2,6)
     @>Text: I've had that egg for the longest, but no one's ever passed my test!
     @>Control Self Switch: A =ON
     @>
    : Else
     @>Script: pbCallBub(2,6)
     @>Text: You have no room for this!
     @>
    : Branch End
    @>
   : When [Psychic]
    @>Script: pbCallBub(2,6)
    @>Text: Ooh! Not quite the answer I was looking for! Try again.
    @>
   : When [Ground]
    @>Script: pbCallBub(2,6)
    @>Text: Ooh! Not quite the answer I was looking for! Try again.
    @>
   : When [Fire]
    @>Script: pbCallBub(2,6)
    @>Text: Ooh! Not quite the answer I was looking for! Try again.
    @>
   : Branch End
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>
 : When [10]
  @>Script: pbCallBub(2,6)
  @>Text: Ooh! Not quite the answer I was looking for! Try again.
  @>
 : When [0]
  @>Script: pbCallBub(2,6)
  @>Text: Ooh! Not quite the answer I was looking for! Try again.
  @>
 : When [50]
  @>Script: pbCallBub(2,6)
  @>Text: Ooh! Not quite the answer I was looking for! Try again.
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: When [On second thought...]
 @>Script: pbCallBub(2,6)
 @>Text: Whats wrong? Not confident in your knowledge?
 @>
: Branch End
@>

  :              : $>Turn Left
  :              : $>Wait: 2 frame(s)
  :              : $>Turn Right
  :              : $>Wait: 2 frame(s)
  :              : $>Turn Up
  :              : $>Wait: 2 frame(s)
 @>Wait for Move's Completion
 @>Change Transparent Flag: Normal
 @>Set Move Route: Player
                   (Ignore If Can't Move)
  :              : $>Through ON
  :              : $>Move Down
  :              : $>Through OFF
 @>Wait for Move's Completion
 @>Set Move Route: This event
                   (Ignore If Can't Move)
  :              : $>Turn Right
  :              : $>Wait: 2 frame(s)
  :              : $>Turn Left
  :              : $>Wait: 2 frame(s)
  :              : $>Turn Down
  :              : $>Wait: 2 frame(s)
 @>Wait for Move's Completion
 @>
: Branch End
@>Script: setTempSwitchOn("A")
@>

@>Script: pbSetPokemonCenter
@>Script: pbCallBub(2,2)
@>Text: Hello, and welcome to the Paeonia City Pokémon Center.
@>Script: pbCallBub(2,2)
@>Text: Be sure to keep your voice down in this area.
@>Script: pbCallBub(2,2)
@>Text: We restore your tired Pokémon to full health.
@>Script: pbCallBub(2,2)
@>Text: Would you like to rest your Pokémon?
@>Show Choices: Yes, No
(When Cancel: Choice 2)
: When [Yes]
 @>Script: pbCallBub(2,2)
 @>Text: OK, I'll take your Pokémon for a few seconds.
 @>Recover All: Entire Party
 @>Set Move Route: [EV003]
  :              : $>Turn Right
 @>Set Move Route: This event
  :              : $>Turn Up
  :              : $>Wait: 2 frame(s)
 @>Wait for Move's Completion
 @>Control Variables: [0006: Poké Center healing ball count] = 0
 @>Script: count=$player.pokemon_count
 :       : for i in 1..count
 :       :   pbSet(6,i)
 :       :   pbSEPlay("Battle ball shake")
 :       :   pbWait(16)
 :       : end
 @>Set Move Route: [PC]

@>Script: pbCallBub(2,1)
@>Text: Oh, ho ho! Yes, I'm the Move Deleter.
@>Script: pbCallBub(2,1)
@>Text: I can make Pokémon forget their moves.
@>Script: pbCallBub(2,1)
@>Text: Would you like me to do that?
@>Show Choices: Yes, No
(When Cancel: Choice 2)
: When [Yes]
 @>Label: ChoosePokemon
 @>Script: pbCallBub(2,1)
 @>Text: Which Pokémon should forget a move?
 @>Script: pbChoosePokemon(1,3)
 @>Comment: If variable 1 is less than 0, it means the player has 
  :       : canceled choosing a Pokémon.
 @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0001: Temp Pokemon Choice] < 0
  @>Script: pbCallBub(2,1)
  @>Text: Come again if there are moves that need to be 
   :    : forgotten.
  @>
 : Else
  @>Conditional Branch: Script: pbGetPokemon(1).egg?
   @>Script: pbCallBub(2,1)
   @>Text: What? No Egg should know any moves.
   @>Exit Event Processing
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>Conditional Branch: Script: pbGetPokemon(1).shadowPokemon?
   @>Script: pbCallBub(2,1)
   @>Text: What? I can't make a Shadow Pokémon forget a 
    :    : move.
   @>Exit Event Processing
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>Conditional Branch: Script: pbGetPokemon(1).numMoves == 1
   @>Script: pbCallBub(2,1)
   @>Text: \v[3] seems to know only one move...
   @>Exit Event Processing
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>Script: pbCallBub(2,1)
  @>Text: Which move should be forgotten?
  @>Script: pbChooseMove(pbGetPokemon(1), 2, 4)
  @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0002: Temp Move Choice] < 0
   @>Jump to Label: ChoosePokemon
   @>
  : Else
   @>Script: pbCallBub(2,1)
   @>Text: Hm! \v[3]'s \v[4]? That move should be forgotten?
   @>Show Choices: Yes, No
   (When Cancel: Choice 2)
   : When [Yes]
    @>Play ME: '013-Gag02', 100, 100
    @>Wait: 80 frame(s)
    @>Script: pbGetPokemon(1).forget_move_at_index(
    :       :    pbGet(2))
    @>Script: pbCallBub(2,1)
    @>Text: It has been done...
    @>Script: pbCallBub(2,1)
    @>Text: \v[3] has forgotten \v[4] completely.
    @>
   : When [No]
    @>Script: pbCallBub(2,1)
    @>Text: Come again if there are moves that need to be 
     :    : forgotten.
    @>
   : Branch End
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: When [No]
 @>Script: pbCallBub(2,1)
 @>Text: Come again if there are moves that need to be 
  :    : forgotten.
 @>
: Branch End
@>Conditional Branch: Player is facing Up
 @>Scroll Map: Down, 1, 3
 @>Wait: 8 frame(s)

Event ID: 001
Event Name: EV001
(X,Y): (019,025)

Page #1
Conditions
None

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Player Touch

List of Event Commands:

@>Change Screen Color Tone: (-255,-255,-255,0), @6
@>Wait: 8 frame(s)
@>Transfer Player:[141: Syringa Town], (015,021), No Fade
@>Change Screen Color Tone: (0,0,0,0), @6
@>

Event ID: 002
Event Name: Day Care Lady
(X,Y): (014,014)

Page #1
Conditions
None

Graphic: trchar055_2

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Action Button

List of Event Commands:
@>Scroll Map: Up, 2, 3
@>Wait: 18 frame(s)
@>Conditional Branch: Script: DayCare.egg_generated?
 @>Script: pbCallBub(2,2)
 @>Text: Ah, there you are! My boyfriend was looking for 
  :    : you.
 @>Exit Event Processing
 @>
: Branch End
@>Control Self Switch: A =OFF
@>Conditional Branch: Script: DayCare.count==0
 @>Script: pbCallBub(2,2)
 @>Text: Welcome to the all new hip and happening Pokémon Day-Care!
 @>Script: pbCallBub(2,2)
 @>Text: I'm the Day-Care Gal. We can raise Pokémon for 
  :    : you.
 @>Script: pbCallBub(2,2)
 @>Text: Would you like us to raise any of your precious Pokémon?
 @>Show Choices: Yes, No
 (When Cancel: Choice 2)
 : When [Yes]
  @>Conditional Branch: Script: $player.pokemon_count <= 1
   @>Script: pbCallBub(2,2)
   @>Text: But you only have one Pokémon with you.
   @>Script: pbCallBub(2,2)
   @>Text: We don't want to turn you into a loner! \nCome back later with
    :    : more Pokémon.
   @>Exit Event Processing
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>Script: pbCallBub(2,2)
  @>Text: Which Pokémon should we raise for you?
  @>Script: pbChooseNonEggPokemon(1,3)
  @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0001: Temp Pokemon Choice] < 0
   @>Script: pbCallBub(2,2)
   @>Text: Oh, that's okay! \nWe hope to see you again!
   @>Exit Event Processing
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>Conditional Branch: Script: !$player.has_other_able_pokemon?(pbGet(1))
   @>Script: pbCallBub(2,2)
   @>Text: But If you leave me with that Pokémon, you're not going to
    :    : have anything to battle with!
   @>Script: pbCallBub(2,2)
   @>Text: Come back later.
   @>Exit Event Processing
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>Script: DayCare.deposit(pbGet(1))
  @>Script: pbCallBub(2,2)
  @>Text: Okay! We'll raise your \v[3] for ya'!
  @>Script: pbCallBub(2,2)
  @>Text: Come back and check on it later.
  @>Label: RaiseAnother
  @>Script: pbCallBub(2,2)
  @>Text: We can raise two of your Pokémon. Would you like 
   :    : us to raise another?
  @>Show Choices: Yes, No
  (When Cancel: Choice 2)
  : When [Yes]
   @>Conditional Branch: Script: $player.pokemon_count <= 1
    @>Script: pbCallBub(2,2)
    @>Text: But you only have one Pokémon with you.
    @>Script: pbCallBub(2,2)
    @>Text: We don't want to turn you into a loner! \nCome back later with
     :    : more Pokémon.
    @>Exit Event Processing
    @>
   : Branch End
   @>Script: pbCallBub(2,2)
   @>Text: Which Pokémon should we raise for you?
   @>Script: pbChooseNonEggPokemon(1,3)
   @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0001: Temp Pokemon Choice] < 0
    @>Script: pbCallBub(2,2)
    @>Text: Awesome! Stop by next time!
    @>Exit Event Processing
    @>
   : Branch End
   @>Conditional Branch: Script: !$player.has_other_able_pokemon?(pbGet(1))
    @>Script: pbCallBub(2,2)
    @>Text: But If you leave me with that Pokémon, you're not going to
     :    : have anything to battle with!
    @>Script: pbCallBub(2,2)
    @>Text: Come back later.
    @>Exit Event Processing
    @>
   : Branch End
   @>Script: DayCare.deposit(pbGet(1))
   @>Script: pbCallBub(2,2)
   @>Text: Okay! We'll raise your \v[3] for ya'!
   @>Script: pbCallBub(2,2)
   @>Text: Come by sometime and check on it! It'll miss you!
   @>
  : When [No]
   @>Conditional Branch: Self Switch A == ON
    @>Jump to Label: TakeBack
    @>
   : Else
    @>Script: pbCallBub(2,2)
    @>Text: That's okay! Stop by next time!
    @>
   : Branch End
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>
 : When [No]
  @>Script: pbCallBub(2,2)
  @>Text: That's okay! Stop by next time!
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: Else
 @>Script: pbCallBub(2,2)
 @>Text: Hey! You're back! Good to see ya'! Now, about your 
  :    : Pokémon...
 @>Conditional Branch: Script: DayCare.get_level_gain(0,3,4) && pbGet(4)>0
  @>Script: pbCallBub(2,2)
  @>Text: By level, your \v[3] has grown by about \v[4].
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>Conditional Branch: Script: DayCare.get_level_gain(1,3,4) && pbGet(4)>0
  @>Script: pbCallBub(2,2)
  @>Text: By level, your \v[3] has grown by about \v[4].
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>Conditional Branch: Script: DayCare.count==1
  @>Control Self Switch: A =ON
  @>Jump to Label: RaiseAnother
  @>
 : Else
  @>Label: TakeBack
  @>Script: pbCallBub(2,2)
  @>Text: Do you want your Pokémon back?
  @>Show Choices: Yes, No
  (When Cancel: Choice 2)
  : When [Yes]
   @>Label: TakeBackChosen
   @>Conditional Branch: Script: $player.party_count >= 6
    @>Script: pbCallBub(2,2)
    @>Text: But you already have a full team. How are you gonna
     :    : make room for this one?
    @>Exit Event Processing
    @>
   : Branch End
   @>Script: DayCare.choose(
   :       : _I("Which one do you want back?"),1)
   @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0001: Temp Pokemon Choice] < 0
    @>Script: pbCallBub(2,2)
    @>Text: That's a-okay! Stop by next time!
    @>Exit Event Processing
    @>
   : Branch End
   @>Script: DayCare.get_details(pbGet(1),3,4)
   @>Script: pbCallBub(2,2)
   @>Text: \GIf you want your \v[3] back, it will cost $\v[4].
   @>Show Choices: Yes, No
   (When Cancel: Choice 2)
   : When [Yes]
    @>Control Variables: [0005: Temp Text Entry] = Gold
    @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0005: Temp Text Entry] < Variable [0004: Temp Move Name]
     @>Script: pbCallBub(2,2)
     @>Text: \GAre you poor? Sorry but leaving Pokémon with a poor
      :    : trainer will reflect badly on us, so we'll hold onto it until
      :    : you make some! Kay?
     @>Exit Event Processing
     @>
    : Branch End
    @>Change Gold: - Variable [0004: Temp Move Name]
    @>Script: DayCare.withdraw(pbGet(1))
    @>Script: pbCallBub(2,2)
    @>Text: \GExcellent\nHere's your Pokémon.
    @>Script: pbCallBub(2,2)
    @>Text: \PN took \v[3] back from the Day-Care Gal.
    @>Conditional Branch: Script: DayCare.count==1
     @>Script: pbCallBub(2,2)
     @>Text: Do you want to take back the other one, too?
     @>Show Choices: Yes, No
     (When Cancel: Choice 2)
     : When [Yes]
      @>Jump to Label: TakeBackChosen
      @>
     : When [No]
      @>Script: pbCallBub(2,2)
      @>Text: That's okay! Stop by next time!
      @>
     : Branch End
     @>
    : Else
     @>Script: pbCallBub(2,2)
     @>Text: That's okay! Stop by next time!
     @>
    : Branch End
    @>
   : When [No]
    @>Script: pbCallBub(2,2)
    @>Text: That's okay! Stop by next time!
    @>
   : Branch End
   @>
  : When [No]
   @>Script: pbCallBub(2,2)
   @>Text: That's okay! Stop by next time!
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: Branch End
@>Scroll Map: Down, 2, 3
@>Wait: 18 frame(s)
@>

Graphic: Door_15

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Autorun

List of Event Commands:
@>Conditional Branch: Script: get_self.onEvent?
 @>Change Transparent Flag: Transparency
 @>Set Move Route: This event
                   (Ignore If Can't Move)
  :              : $>SE: 'Automatic Door', 100, 100

  :              : $>Wait: 2 frame(s)

 :              : $>Turn Left

 :              : $>Turn Up

Common Event ID: 001
Common Event Name: Professor Oak phone

Trigger: None

List of Event Commands:
@>Text: ......\wt[5] ......
@>Conditional Branch: Script: $game_map.map_id==4
 @>Text: Hello, \PN!\nI can see you calling me over there!
 @>Text: Come over and talk to me.
 @>Jump to Label: End call
 @>
: Branch End
@>Text: Hello, this is Professor Oak...\nOh, hello, \PN!
@>Text: So, how's your Pokédex coming along?
@>Show Choices: Evaluate Pokédex, Quit
(When Cancel: Choice 2)
: When [Evaluate Pokédex]
 @>Script: pbSet(1,$Trainer.pokedex.seen_count)
 :       : pbSet(2,$Trainer.pokedex.owned_count)
 @>Text: Hmm, let's see..\nYou've seen \v[1] Pokémon, and
  :    : \nyou've caught \v[2] Pokémon!\nI see!
 @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0002: Temp Move Choice] < 30
  @>Text: Hmm, you still have a long journey ahead of you!
   :    : \nKeep on going!
  @>Jump to Label: End evaluation
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0002: Temp Move Choice] < 75
  @>Text: Hmm, you're catching Pokémon at a decent pace!
  @>Jump to Label: End evaluation
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0002: Temp Move Choice] < 150
  @>Text: You've caught a lot of Pokémon, but make sure you're 
   :    : raising them carefully!
  @>Jump to Label: End evaluation
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0002: Temp Move Choice] >= 150
  @>Text: I didn't even know that many Pokémon existed!
  @>Jump to Label: End evaluation
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>Label: End evaluation
 @>Text: Show me your Pokédex again anytime!
 @>
: When [Quit]
 @>Text: Show me your Pokédex anytime!
 @>
: Branch End
@>Label: End call
@>Text: Click!\wt[10]\n......\wt[5] ......
@>

Common Event ID: 002
Common Event Name: May dependent event

Trigger: None

List of Event Commands:
@>Text: \rDo you want me to stop following you?
@>Show Choices: Yes, No
(When Cancel: Choice 2)
: When [Yes]
 @>Text: \rI'll just vanish, then.
 @>Script: Followers.remove("May")
 @>Script: pbDeregisterPartner
 @>
: When [No]
 @>Text: \rLet's keep going!
 @>
: Branch End
@>
